biotools.summary: ASSAM tool searches for patterns of amino acid side chains in 3D space within PDB structures. Input must be a 3D amino acid pattern, which will be used in based on distances between the amino acid side chains.

bioschemas.name: ASSAM
bioschemas.summary: ASSAM tool searches for patterns of amino acid side chains in 3D space within PDB structures. Input must be a 3D amino acid pattern, which will be used in based on distances between the amino acid side chains.
